com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.label

Class StringMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.label.StringMetrics

  • public class StringMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper function to measure text width and height when drawing Beware that height is not perfect
